citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The report to the Institutional Official of the July 2022 semiannual facility inspection and program review was not reviewed
and signed by a majority of the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) and available during inspection.
The documentation of the semi annual program review and facility inspection was available. The reports shall be reviewed
and signed by a majority of the IACUC members; updated at least once every six months upon completion of the required
semiannual evaluations; maintained by the research facility and made available to APHIS for inspection.
Correct by 30 June 2023

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, in one of the protocols, the principal investigator (PI) had not signed the electronic version of the
protocol, providing written assurance that the activities do not unnecessarily duplicate previous experiments. The
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee shall determine that the proposed activities meet these requirements.
Correct by 30 June 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attending Veterinarian.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The report to the Institutional Official of the July 2022 semiannual facility inspection and program review was not reviewed 
and signed by a majority of the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) and available during inspection. 
The documentation of the semi annual program review and facility inspection was available. The reports shall be reviewed 
and signed by a majority of the IACUC members; updated at least once every six months upon completion of the required 
semiannual evaluations; maintained by the research facility and made available to APHIS for inspection. 
 
Correct by 30 June 2023 
2.31(d)(1)(iii) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
At the time of inspection, in one of the protocols, the principal investigator (PI) had not signed the electronic version of the 
protocol, providing written assurance that the activities do not unnecessarily duplicate previous experiments. The 
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee shall determine that the proposed activities meet these requirements. 
 
Correct by 30 June 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attending Veterinarian. 
 
 n
